The #RGV is full of self-starters, hard workers and a strong community that works together.

Juntos, Crecemos.

Today, we remember the brave soldiers who stormed the beaches of Normandy to end the deadliest war in history. These veterans fought against tyranny, and we must keep that fight going. https://t.co/a239e2xouN

Another week in the books working for the 15th District of Texas. Check out some of what I’ve been doing for our community ⬇️
 
For more updates sign up for my newsletter at: https://t.co/eiyWJNwDrr https://t.co/9KIxe59I3l

There are thousands of service members unable to live in the country they fought for. We made a promise to take care of our veterans and it’s past time we keep our promise. My bill the #RepatriateOurPatriotsAct will bring deported veterans home.

Great news! The @usmbda is extending deadlines for 3 applications!
 
Business Center Competition –June 6

Minority Colleges and Universities Competition –June 7

Access to Capital: Innovative Finance Competition –June 8
 
Learn more here: https://t.co/YPVTono79b

We must address our nation's road safety crisis together.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law creates the Safe Streets and Roads for All Program to help communities make improvements to prevent roadway deaths & serious injuries: https://t.co/WWwLnK9URK #SaferRoads
Great news: @UTRGV is receiving $475,000 from @usedgov from the College Assistance Migrant Program to support education opportunities for farmworkers & their families. https://t.co/xz2qSFBHBa

This is the land of opportunity. We shouldn't be leaving Americans saddled with debt. @potus needs to #CancelStudentDebtNow.
 
https://t.co/KTorqOMv4P

Thank you VFW Post 7473, the Women’s Auxiliary, The Catholic War Veterans, the Weslaco Fire Department, @HidalgoCounty Veterans Service Officer Felix Rodriguez, and the Highland Cemetery Staff for allowing me to take part in such a beautiful and moving Memorial Day ceremony. https://t.co/ZzCd6q3zXj
